item.description:
Our December 12 speaker, Sean O'Reilly, founder of 3D Printsmith in Brighton, MA, www.3dprintsmith.com, will tell us about state of the art in 3D printed prototypes (plastics, ceramics and metals) and the future of "Additive Manufacturing".

Arrive as early as 6:30 to network with others. The meeting starts promptly at 7:00. A map of MIT showing the meeting location is at http://whereis.mit.edu/?selection=4&Bui.... Street parking is suggested on Ames Street or Memorial Drive. Most MIT buildings have easy access and are interconnected. For more about the Inventors Association of New England, go to our website at www.inventne.com
item.name: Inventors Association of New England Monthly Meetup
